AppFolderName._message.comment: Application folder name for uploaded documents

AppDescription.message: View, edit, and create documents in your browser.
AppDescription._message.comment: Application description. A plain text string (no HTML or other formatting; no more than 132 characters)

AppDescriptionWithEditor.message: View, edit, and create files within the browser, and bring out your best writing across the web.
AppDescriptionWithEditor._message.comment: Application description with Editor. A plain text string (no HTML or other formatting; no more than 132 characters). The string MUST be less than 132 characters in all locales. This is a hard requirement.

AppLongDescription.message:
Built for Chrome – Use Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Sway Online without needing Microsoft 365 installed.

Create with confidence – Use familiar formatting and layout options to express your ideas in full fidelity.

Work on the go – Get to your files from anywhere, thanks to integration with OneDrive and OneDrive for Business.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/officechromeextensionterms

Privacy Policy: http://aka.ms/privacy

AppLongDescriptionWithEditor.message:
Built for Chrome – Use Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Sway Online without needing Microsoft 365 installed.

Create with confidence – Use familiar formatting and layout options to express your ideas in full fidelity.

Work on the go – Get to your files from anywhere, thanks to integration with OneDrive and OneDrive for Business.

The Microsoft 365 browser extension now includes proofing of your content*. It connects to a Microsoft online service that offers spelling, grammar and refinements suggestions for your writing on most websites and is available in more than 80 languages.

*This feature may not be available for all users.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/officechromeextensionterms

Privacy Policy: http://aka.ms/privacy
AppLongDescriptionWithEditor._message.comment: Application long description with Editor - Editor is the brand name for the new feature.

AppLongDescriptionEdge.message:
Microsoft 365 browser extension puts an icon on the Microsoft Edge toolbar that gives you direct access to your Microsoft 365 files, whether they are stored online or on your computer.

Microsoft 365 web extension can open files stored in OneDrive and OneDrive for Business.

You get the features of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Sway right in your browser without needing Microsoft 365 installed.

The Microsoft 365 browser extension now includes proofing of your content*. It connects to a Microsoft online service that offers spelling, grammar and refinements suggestions for your writing on most websites and is available in more than 80 languages.

*This feature may not be available for all users.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions:
AppLongDescriptionEdge._message.comment: Application long description for Microsoft Edge

AppTermsOfServiceLCA.message: PLEASE NOTE: Refer to your license terms for Microsoft 365 browser extension software (the "software") to identify the entity licensing this supplement to you and for support information. You may use a copy of this supplement with each validly licensed copy of the software. You may not use the supplement if you do not have a license for the software. The license terms for the software apply to your use of this supplement.

UploadToOneDriveBusinessLabel._message.comment: Label text for local file picker in Edge for O365 users

AppListLabel._message.comment: Label text for app list header

RecentDocsLabel._message.comment: Label text for opening recent documents

RecentDocsItemAriaLabel.message: link will open in new tab.
RecentDocsItemAriaLabel._message.comment: Label text for opening recent documents

CreateDocsMessageLabel._message.comment: Label text for document creation to appear in recents list

DocumentsNotFoundMessageLabel.message: We can't get the list of your recent documents right now.
DocumentsNotFoundMessageLabel._message.comment: Message to display when we receive an error call the MRU service

LoadingRecentsLabel._message.comment: Label to display while getting recents list

CreateNewLabel._message.comment: Label text for creating new document

OfflineLabel.message: You're offline. Please re-connect to use Microsoft 365 browser extension.
OfflineLabel._message.comment: Label to tell user they are working offline

SignInLabel._message.comment: Label text for Sign in link

SignInMSALabel.message: Sign in with a Microsoft account
SignInMSALabel._message.comment: Label text for Sign in to MSA link

SignInO365Label.message: Sign in with a work or school account
SignInO365Label._message.comment: Label text for Sign in to O365 link

SignOutLabel._message.comment: Label text for Sign out link

CreateAccountLabel._message.comment: Label text for account creation link

TelemetrySettingLabel.message: Automatically send data to help us improve our products.

WebRedirectSettingLabel.message: Open Microsoft 365 files directly in the browser with Microsoft 365.
WebRedirectSettingLabel._message.comment: Label text for web document redirect checkbox

MoreFilesLabel._message.comment: Label to view more recent documents

SignInHeaderLabel.message: Where do you want to save your files?
SignInHeaderLabel._message.comment: Label text for sign in location

FileTypeErrorMessage.message: The file type is not supported. Please choose a Word, Excel or PowerPoint document.
FileTypeErrorMessage._message.comment: Text for file type error message

NotificationFileAccess.message: In the extension settings, select the "Allow access to file URLs" checkbox if you want to drag and drop files into the browser.

NotificationFileMaxSizeByteLimitReached.message: Microsoft 365 browser extension is unable to open your document because of the size.  Please upload directly to OneDrive to open the document.

NotificationFileUploadFailureGeneric.message: Sorry, we were unable to open your file.

NotificationFileUploadFailureServer.message: Sorry, we were unable to open your file.  Please try again at a later time.

NotificationFileUploadFailureUnsupported.message: Sorry, we were unable to open your file.  Please choose a file created with Word, Excel, or PowerPoint

NotificationFileUploadInProgress.message: We are currently uploading your document(s).

NotificationSetDefault.message: In the Files app, tap documents with two fingers to open with Microsoft 365.

NotificationAutoSaveToOneDrive.message: We saved your file in the "Microsoft 365 browser extension" folder on your OneDrive.

NotificationAutoSaveToSharePoint.message: We saved your file in the "Microsoft 365 browser extension" folder on your OneDrive for Business.

NotificationNotSignedIn.message: Sign in to the extension to view and edit files in Microsoft 365 on the web.

NotificationUnsupportedFileType.message: Choose a file created with Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.

NotificationInvalidSubscription.message: Your Microsoft 365 subscription may be expired or may not include OneDrive for Business. Check your subscription or log in with a Microsoft Account instead.

NotificationWebDocRedirect.message: The Microsoft 365 extension is opening your document in the browser
NotificationWebDocRedirect._message.comment: Text for web document redirect notification

NotificationWebDocRedirectButton._message.comment: Text for dismissing the web document redirect notification

OfficeOnlineAppName._message.comment: Text for directing to Microsoft 365 on the web

SharePermissionsTooltip.message: You don't have permission to share
SharePermissionsTooltip._message.comment: Text for HTML title attribute (Chrome only)

SharePermissionsErrorMessage._message.comment: Text for on-hover error message (Edge only)

MyAccountLabel._message.comment: Label text for my account page

EditorSpellingToggleLabel._message.comment: Label text for the toggle control that allows user to turn on or off spellchecking in Editor

EditorGrammarToggleLabel._message.comment: Label text for the toggle control that allows user to turn on or off grammar checking in Editor

EditorRefinementsToggleLabel._message.comment: Label text for the toggle control that allows user to turn on or off advanced grammar and style checking (refinements) in Editor

DisableEditorOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for button that allows a user to disable the Editor feature on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EnableEditorOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for button that allows a user to enable back the Editor feature on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorIsDisabledOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for tells the user that the Editor feature has been disabled on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorIsBlockedOnThisSiteLabel.message: Editor is not currently supported on $host$
EditorIsBlockedOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for tells the user that the Editor feature has been blocked by the system or remotely by Microsoft on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com and cannot be enabled by the user. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorPreviewLabel._message.comment: Label shown at the right of the 'Editor' brand name to signify that it is a preview. In English it will look like: 'Microsoft Editor (Preview)'. NOTE: as of 8 jan 2020 the brand name has been confirmed to be 'Editor'.

EditorBrandText._message.comment: Microsoft Editor product brand name displayed without the Microsoft prefix. This is required to save space in the dropdown and needs to be applied to localized strings as well.

EditorIsOffLabel._message.comment: Label text for tells the user that the Editor feature has been turned off.

TurnOnEditorLabel._message.comment: Label text for button that allows a user to turn back on the Editor feature.

EditorRefinementsTooltip.message: Refinements are advanced writing suggestions to help make your writing clearer, less wordy or more formal.
EditorRefinementsTooltip._message.comment: The tooltip text of refinements toggle for subscription users.

EditorRefinementsGoPremiumTooltip.message: Get advanced writing ideas and 1 TB storage when you go premium.
EditorRefinementsGoPremiumTooltip._message.comment: The tooltip text of refinements toggle for non-subscription users.

StandaloneExtensionInstalledLabel.message: The Editor service is being provided by the Microsoft Editor extension.
StandaloneExtensionInstalledLabel._message.comment: Label for telling the user that Editor's functionality is being provided by the standalone extension.

EditorNativeSupportOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label for telling the user that the Editor feature is provided natively on a specific page such as outlook.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorPriorityShutdownLabel.message: The Editor service is being provided by the Microsoft Editor extension.
EditorPriorityShutdownLabel._message.comment: The text shown in the popup when Microsoft Editor extension is detected.

AppsModuleLinkText._message.comment: Text for the link to the apps module

AppsSectionHeader._message.comment: Text for the header of the apps section
